Import proc

```{r}
library(haven)
airline <- read_sas("http://www.principlesofeconometrics.com/sas/airline.sas7bdat", 
    NULL)

airline
```

Data wrangling
```{r}
library(tidyverse)

airline %>%
 filter(Y >= 12.8 & Y <= 23.8) %>%
 filter(W >= 0.76 & W <= 1.78) %>%
 filter(R >= 
    0.32 & R <= 0.59) %>%
 ggplot() +
 aes(x = Y, y = W, colour = YEAR) +
 geom_point(size = 1L) +
 scale_color_gradient() +
 theme_minimal()
```
